scripts.build: bun build app/index.ts --target bun --outdir dist --external ioredis --external unstorage/drivers/redis
scripts.compile: bun build app/index.ts --compile --outfile dist/${npm_package_name} --external ioredis --external unstorage/drivers/redis
scripts.examples:test: bun run examples/01-sync.ts && bun run examples/02-rooms.ts && bun run examples/03-messages.ts && bun run examples/04-state.ts && bun run examples/05-e2ee-keys.ts && bun run examples/06-admin.ts && bun run examples/07-send-to-device.ts && bun run examples/08-multi-device-keys.ts && bun run examples/09-device-verification.ts && bun run examples/10-notifications.ts
